acquisition.title: Acquisition
acquisition.desc-new-1: The Acquisition Program aims to help your publisher attract writers to monetize their posts under your publishing name on Wacaku.
acquisition.desc-new-3: No program has been created yet. Please click the button
acquisition.rule-content-1: Please fill in all fields on the left and then press the publish program button.
acquisition.rule-content-2: After the program is published, press the copy link button and share the information according to your strategy.
acquisition.rule-content-3: If writers have submitted their posts through the link you shared, you can see the acquired writers in the Acquired Writers section below
acquisition.search-participant-placeholder: Search writer or post name here
acquisition.publish-acquisition-confirmation-desc: Are you sure you want to publish this acquisition program?
acquisition.post-desc-modal: has been monetized before, are you sure you want to re-monetize this post?
acquisition.post-desc-confirm: Are you sure you want to monetize the post
